Easy and Simple Discord Login with a Token!

This practical extension allows you to log into any Discord account using just a token. It's straightforward:

Open the extension window;
Paste your token;
Click "Login"!
The extension will automatically open a new tab and log in to the Discord account associated with the token.

Why Install?

Convenient: No need to enter your username and passwordâ€”just paste the token and log in.
Fast and Efficient: Log in to Discord quickly, perfect for users who frequently switch accounts.
Whether you're a developer or a power user, this extension makes your Discord login experience smoother. Download now and enjoy easy access to your accounts! ðŸš€
